summary: This appears to be an internal email or memo from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, congratulating a Utilities Program Manager on their promotion to General Foreman. The document is part of the Epstein case files, suggesting it may relate to staff at the facility where Epstein was held.

persons.name: Flom
persons.context: Appears as the sender of an internal memo or email regarding a staff promotion at MCC New York.

keyFacts: The document is an internal communication from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York.
It congratulates a Utilities Program Manager on a promotion to General Foreman.
The document's inclusion in the Epstein case files suggests it may relate to staff or operations at the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated.
